config.imageDir.description: Folder name for saving images. Relative path.
config.namingConvention.description:
Image file naming pattern.

Available placeholders:
- ${timestamp} (yyyymmddThhmmss format, e.g., 20250104T123456)
- ${seq} (auto-increment number starting from 1, e.g., 1, 2, 3)

Examples:
- image-${timestamp}
- image-${seq}

Note: If file already exists, -1, -2, ... will be appended automatically.
config.useWorkspaceRoot.description: When false (default), images are saved relative to the Markdown file location. When true, images are saved relative to the workspace root.
config.debugMode.description: Enable debug logging to console (default: false).
config.progressDelay.description: Delay in seconds before showing the progress notification (default: 0.3).
config.convertUrlToLink.description: Automatically convert pasted URLs to Markdown links with page titles (default: false).
config.urlFetchTimeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for fetching page titles (default: 300).
